thread.title: Reuters Newsmaker: North American Toyota CEO Jim Lentz

title: Reuters Newsmaker: North American Toyota CEO Jim Lentz
text:
Reuters Newsmaker: North American Toyota CEO Jim Lentz Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 58:38 
CEO of Toyota North America, Jim Lentz, joins Reuters for a discussion on increased demand for fully electric and hybrid electric vehicles, proliferation of artificial intelligence and continued convergence of the tech and auto industries. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
CEO of Toyota North America, Jim Lentz, joins Reuters for a discussion on increased demand for fully electric and hybrid electric vehicles, proliferation of artificial intelligence and continued convergence of the tech and auto industries.
